name: Cat Street
description:
2D infinite runner with different altitudes. Made for Linux Game Jam 2022.

Objective:  Dodge other cats and their bullets.

Control:  W/A/S/D to move, Q/E to increase/decrease altitude, `  to toggle debug console, ESC to pause.

Software: Godot 3.4.4, Krita  5.0.2, GarageBand.

Credits: None. Everything is made during the period of this jam.

Source code: Github repo (GPLv3)
